title: Inference job
description: An inference for the DL predictor

jobId.description: The unique identifier for the job

timestamp.description: A UNIX timestamp of when the job was submitted

modelWeightsFilePath.description: Path to file containing the weights of the DL model (in Minio storage) Required format: bucket/path/to/weights/file

imagePath.description: Path to image (in Minio storage) that the DL model should process. In the format: bucket/path/to/output/files

maxDets.description: Integer value specifying the maximum number of detections per image

outputLocation.description: Path to resulted output files (in Minio storage) In the format: bucket/path/to/output/files

puttoDB.description: Boolean flag signaling whether to store inference results (bounding boxes) in MongoDB

daqName.description: Name of the DAQ (including year if any)
